requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: CHEM 205L will connect your understanding of the interaction of light & matter to the determination of molecular structure through spectroscopic methods. Students will assign atomic/molecular spectra & analyze results to determine critical properties of the compound using rigorous math on real molecules.
prerequisites: (CHEM 203L or CHEM_OX 203L or CHEM 203ZL) and (MATH 111 or MATH_OX 111) as prerequisites and (CHEM 205 or CHEM_OX 205) as co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit.
